goal.ch: 地震學是科學的方法研究地震波，以了解地球的內部構造與地震發生的物理機制。本課程介紹地震學理論、如何量化地震波的觀測，期為地物領域研究生的基礎紮根。
goal.en: Seismology is the scientific study of earthquake waves to learn the structure of Earth and the physics of earthquakes. This course focuses on basic Seismological theory, in particular those of quantitative analysis of seismic waveforms, with the hope of building the theoretical foundations for students in the fields of Geophysics.

outline.ch:
Introduction
Stress and Strain
Seismic Wave Equations
Planes Waves in Layer Structures
Surface Waves
Q and attenuation
Seismic Source and Green’s Functions
Haskell Propagator Matrix
Normal modes
outline.en:
Introduction
Stress and Strain
Seismic Wave Equations
Planes Waves in Layer Structures
Surface Waves

Seismic Source and Green’s Functions
Haskell Propagator Matrix
Normal modes

textbook.ch:
“Stein ＆ Wysession: An Introduction to Seismology, Earthquakes, and Earth Structure.
Aki ＆ Richards: Quantitative Seismology, 2nd edition.
Peter Shearer: Introduction to Seismology, 3rd edition.“
textbook.en:
“Stein ＆ Wysession: An Introduction to Seismology, Earthquakes, and Earth Structure.

Peter Shearer: Introduction to Seismology, 3rd edition.“
